author: xTuple <dev@xtuple.com>
name: xtuple-private-extensions
description: xTuple Enterprise Resource Planning Mobile-Web client private extensions

scripts.build-basic-manufacturing-package-sql: ../xtuple/scripts/explode_manifest.js -m source/inventory/foundation-database/frozen_manifest.js -n inventory_basic_install.sql; ../xtuple/scripts/explode_manifest.js -m source/inventory/foundation-database/manifest.js -n inventory_upgrade.sql; ../xtuple/scripts/explode_manifest.js -m source/commercialcore/foundation-database/frozen_manifest.js -n commercialcore_basic_install.sql; ../xtuple/scripts/explode_manifest.js -m source/commercialcore/foundation-database/manifest.js -n commercialcore_upgrade.sql; ../xtuple/scripts/explode_manifest.js -m source/manufacturing/foundation-database/frozen_manifest.js -n manufacturing_basic_install.sql; ../xtuple/scripts/explode_manifest.js -m source/manufacturing/foundation-database/manifest.js -n manufacturing_upgrade.sql;
scripts.build-basic-distribution-package-sql: ../xtuple/scripts/explode_manifest.js -m source/inventory/foundation-database/frozen_manifest.js -n inventory_basic_install.sql; ../xtuple/scripts/explode_manifest.js -m source/inventory/foundation-database/manifest.js -n inventory_upgrade.sql; ../xtuple/scripts/explode_manifest.js -m source/commercialcore/foundation-database/frozen_manifest.js -n commercialcore_basic_install.sql; ../xtuple/scripts/explode_manifest.js -m source/commercialcore/foundation-database/manifest.js -n commercialcore_upgrade.sql; ../xtuple/scripts/explode_manifest.js -m source/distribution/foundation-database/frozen_manifest.js -n distribution_basic_install.sql; ../xtuple/scripts/explode_manifest.js -m source/distribution/foundation-database/manifest.js -n distribution_upgrade.sql;
scripts.build-basic-manufacturing-empty: cd ../xtuple; ./scripts/build_app.js -d mfgempty --databaseonly -e foundation-database -i -s foundation-database/empty_data.sql; ./scripts/build_app.js -d mfgempty -e ../private-extensions/source/inventory/foundation-database -f --databaseonly; ./scripts/build_app.js -d mfgempty -e ../private-extensions/source/commercialcore/foundation-database -f --databaseonly; ./scripts/build_app.js -d mfgempty -e ../private-extensions/source/manufacturing/foundation-database -f --databaseonly;
scripts.build-basic-manufacturing-quickstart: cd ../xtuple; ./scripts/build_app.js -d mfgquickstart --databaseonly -e foundation-database -i -s foundation-database/quickstart_data.sql; ./scripts/build_app.js -d mfgquickstart -e ../private-extensions/source/inventory/foundation-database -f --databaseonly; ./scripts/build_app.js -d mfgquickstart -e ../private-extensions/source/commercialcore/foundation-database -f --databaseonly; ./scripts/build_app.js -d mfgquickstart -e ../private-extensions/source/manufacturing/foundation-database -f --databaseonly;
scripts.build-basic-manufacturing-demo: cd ../xtuple; ./scripts/build_app.js -d mfgdemo --databaseonly -e foundation-database -i -s foundation-database/postbooks_demo_data.sql; ./scripts/build_app.js -d mfgdemo -e ../private-extensions/source/inventory/foundation-database -f --databaseonly; ./scripts/build_app.js -d mfgdemo -e ../private-extensions/source/commercialcore/foundation-database -f --databaseonly; ./scripts/build_app.js -d mfgdemo -e ../private-extensions/source/manufacturing/foundation-database -f --databaseonly;
scripts.build-basic-distribution-empty: cd ../xtuple; ./scripts/build_app.js -d distempty --databaseonly -e foundation-database -i -s foundation-database/empty_data.sql; ./scripts/build_app.js -d distempty -e ../private-extensions/source/inventory/foundation-database -f --databaseonly; ./scripts/build_app.js -d distempty -e ../private-extensions/source/commercialcore/foundation-database -f --databaseonly; ./scripts/build_app.js -d distempty -e ../private-extensions/source/distribution/foundation-database -f --databaseonly;
scripts.build-basic-distribution-quickstart: cd ../xtuple; ./scripts/build_app.js -d distquickstart --databaseonly -e foundation-database -i -s foundation-database/quickstart_data.sql; ./scripts/build_app.js -d distquickstart -e ../private-extensions/source/inventory/foundation-database -f --databaseonly; ./scripts/build_app.js -d distquickstart -e ../private-extensions/source/commercialcore/foundation-database -f --databaseonly; ./scripts/build_app.js -d distquickstart -e ../private-extensions/source/distribution/foundation-database -f --databaseonly;
scripts.build-basic-distribution-demo: cd ../xtuple; ./scripts/build_app.js -d distdemo --databaseonly -e foundation-database -i -s foundation-database/postbooks_demo_data.sql; ./scripts/build_app.js -d distdemo -e ../private-extensions/source/inventory/foundation-database -f --databaseonly; ./scripts/build_app.js -d distdemo -e ../private-extensions/source/commercialcore/foundation-database -f --databaseonly; ./scripts/build_app.js -d distdemo -e ../private-extensions/source/distribution/foundation-database -f --databaseonly;
